category_label: Storage, Cold Chain & Post-Harvest Infrastructure Schemes

schemes.name: Cold Storage Infrastructure Development Subsidy
schemes.department: Department of Horticulture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides financial assistance for construction and modernization of cold storage units to reduce post-harvest losses in horticulture crops.
schemes.benefits: Reduced post-harvest losses, better storage facilities and improved shelf-life of horticulture produce.
schemes.eligibility: FPOs, Farmer Cooperatives, SHGs, Agripreneurs and Private Operators.
schemes.how_to_apply: Department of Horticulture / State Level Committee

schemes.name: Pack House, Sorting & Grading Unit Subsidy
schemes.department: Department of Horticulture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Subsidy assistance for establishment of pack houses, sorting, washing and grading units for improving market quality standards.
schemes.benefits: Improved market quality, better price realization and reduced wastage.
schemes.eligibility: Eligible horticulture farmers, SHGs, FPO groups and cooperative marketing societies.

schemes.name: Refrigerated Transport & Mobile Cold Storage Support
schemes.department: Department of Horticulture & Ministry of Food Processing Industries
schemes.description: Financial assistance for procurement of reefer vans, refrigerated trucks and mobile cold rooms for farm-to-market transportation.
schemes.benefits: Reduced spoilage during transportation, improved logistics and market access.
schemes.eligibility: FPOs, food processors, cooperatives, farmer producer enterprises and agro-export units.

schemes.name: Warehouse & Rural Godown Construction Subsidy
schemes.description: Provides capital subsidy support for establishment of scientific storage godowns and village-level warehouses to prevent distress sale.
schemes.benefits: Better storage infrastructure, reduced distress sales and improved price realization.
schemes.eligibility: Individual farmers, PACS, FPOs, cooperatives and private entrepreneurs.

schemes.name: Primary Collection & Aggregation Center Assistance
schemes.description: Support for development of village-level farmer collection centers equipped with weighing, cleaning and temporary storage facilities.
schemes.benefits: Improved aggregation, better market access and reduced post-harvest losses.
schemes.eligibility: FPOs, farmer groups, SHGs and cooperative produce marketing societies.
